summary.span: 命名空間包含管理遠端物件存留期 (Lifetime) 的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that manage the lifetime of remote objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳統上，分散式記憶體回收會使用參考計數和控制物件的存留期進行 ping。Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control over the lifetime of objects. 這適用於有少數的用戶端，每個服務，但有數以千計的每個服務的用戶端時，也無法擴充。This works well when there are a few clients per service, but doesn't scale well when there are thousands of clients per service. 遠端存留期服務租用關聯每個服務，以及其租用時間到期時，會刪除服務。The remoting lifetime service associates a lease with each service, and deletes a service when its lease time expires. 存留期服務會採用傳統的分散式記憶體回收行程，函式的它也會調整良好的每一部伺服器的用戶端數目增加時。The lifetime service can take on the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and it also adjusts well when the numbers of clients per server increases. 每個應用程式定義域都包含租用管理員會負責控制其網域中的租用。Each application domain contains a lease manager that is responsible for controlling leases in its domain. 所有租用期過期會定期都檢查的。All leases are examined periodically for expired lease times. 租用期過期，會叫用一或多個租用期的贊助者，並有機會更新租用。If a lease has expired, one or more of the lease's sponsors are invoked and given the opportunity to renew the lease. 如果沒有贊助者決定更新租用期，租用管理員會移除租用，並可以由記憶體回收行程回收的物件。If none of the sponsors decides to renew the lease, the lease manager removes the lease and the object can be collected by the garbage collector. 租用管理員會維護租用清單依剩餘的租用時間的租用。The lease manager maintains a lease list with leases sorted by remaining lease time. 以最短的剩餘時間的租用會儲存在清單頂端。The leases with the shortest remaining time are stored at the top of the list.
